mapper.select: SELECT c.*, m.id,m.name FROM( SELECT row_number() over(order by c_game_no desc) as rnum, c_game_no, title, min_Personnel, max_Personnel, game_time, materials, writer_id, cg_no FROM CUSTOM_GAME) c, INSSA_MEMBER m where c.writer_id=m.id and rnum between #{startRowNumber} and #{endRowNumber} order by c_game_no desc
select c.c_game_no,c.title,c.max_Personnel,c.min_Personnel,c.game_Time, c.materials,c.content,c.cg_no,m.id,m.name from CUSTOM_GAME c, INSSA_MEMBER m where c.writer_id=m.id and c_game_no=#{value}
